title: Petrus decorative shaded display face on wine label
content:
I am searching for a font similar to the one used in the word PETRUS on this wine label. I would be happy if someone could help me with suggestions. If anyone happens to have suggestions on the words POMEROL and GRAND VIN it would make me even more happy. Thank you for taking an interest.

Petter

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130126095219im_/http:/typophile.com/files/petrus_label_5738.jpg)
author: P_P

comments.content:
Can’t help much with the type.  
But I’d really love to just have a zip of that wine.
I was going to say that Pomerol is a bit like Chevalier/stripes, but then realized your M has the legs spread. I wonder if this is all predigital type.

_I wonder if this is all predigital type._

I’m pretty sure it is. As far as I know the Petrus label hasn’t changed in decades.
A bottle of Petrus and i draw you the type!
Wouldn't say no to a case of a different Pomerol (could be Pauillac as well), should the Petrus be not available ;-)
Petit Petrus perhaps? See what I can do. You start drawing and I'll work on a bottle of Pomerol wine :o)
I'll try to get you a vectorized bottle so you can adapt the content according to the situation
What about a real bottle in exchange to the vectorized type?
